entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 1:26 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of freezing rain. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
